snippet: Gov. Chris Christie tries to demonstrate his political balancing act.
abstract: Editorial observes that New Jersey Gov Chris Christie has confounded political forces on both sides by signing law banning junk-science practice of 'gay-conversion therapy' on minors and by his veto of bill banning .50 caliber rifles; contends that two bills offers especially clear example of Christie's political balancing act, and his search for a viable middle ground in his party.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie tries to demonstrate his political balancing act.

headline.main: Guns and Gays in New Jersey
headline.print_headline: Guns and Gays in New Jersey

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
